price: 47. Markiise uu ula yimid Calaamooyinka- yaga mise wayba ku qosleen.
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُم بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ إِذَا هُم مِّنۡهَا يَضۡحَكُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: falammā jāahum biāyātinā idhā hum min'hā yaḍḥakūna
